newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria retail sales rise 3.3 pct in Jan-July.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria retail sales rise 3.3 pct in Jan-July.

text.p: Bulgarian retail sales in the first seven months of this year were a real 3.3 percent higher than a year earlier, National Statistical Institute (NSI) figures show.
BULGARIA RETAIL SALES JAN-JULY JAN-JUNE JAN-JULY'95

Retail sales in July totalled some 62 billion levs, down a real 2.4 percent from July 1995. Food sales accounted for some 45 percent of the total amount last month, the NSI said. -- Sofia Newsroom, (++359-2) 981 8569
